data.title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
Search in Rotated Sorted Array
data.code:
class Solution:
	def search(self, A, t):
		l, r = 0, len(A) -1
		while l < r:
			go_left = False
			mid = (l+r)//2
			if A[l] <= A[mid]:
				go_left = A[l] <= t <= A[mid]
			else:
				go_left = not (A[mid+1] <= t <= A[r])
			
			if go_left:
				r = mid
			else:
				l = mid+1
		if A[l] == t:
			return l
		return -1



s = Solution()

res = s.search([1,2,3,4], 3)
print(res, 2)

res = s.search([2,3,4, 1], 3)
print(res, 1)

res = s.search([3,4, 1, 2], 3)
print(res, 0)

res = s.search([4, 1,2,3], 3)
print(res, 3)

res = s.search([1, 2, 3], 1)
print(res, 0)

res = s.search([2, 3, 1], 1)
print(res, 2)

res = s.search([3, 1, 2], 1)
print(res, 1)
